means: 给…津贴或补贴，资助或补助…( subsidize的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Its heavily-subsidized economy is in ruins.
sentence.Network_cn: 其靠资助维持的经济已经完全崩溃了。

sentence.Network_en: The housing projects are subsidized by the government.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些住房项目得到政府的补贴。

sentence.Network_en: Around the world, governments have subsidized the housing of middle and upper-income groups.
sentence.Network_cn: 全世界各国政府都为中高收入群体提供过住房补贴。

PerfectNetExp.abs: farmers , instead of growing subsidized maize and wheat at high cost , could concentrate on cash crops , like cashews and chocolate , and use the money they made to buy staple foods .农民不在种植成本过高的政府补贴玉米或小麦，转而种植像腰果、可可一类的经济作物。然后用赚来的钱购买主食。
the U.S. is permitted to respond to subsidized imports where the elements of a subsidy are met under the countervailing duty law .美国可以根据反补贴税法，对符合补贴条件的受补贴进口产品采取应对措施。
in turn , moneylenders slip money to clerks to let them use the ration cards to collect the subsidized grain , sugar and fuel .放债者会塞钱给办事员，让他们用配给卡去囤积国家补贴的粮食、食糖和燃料。
now unless the subsidized commodity is also rationed , it is those with the most purchasing power that can buy most of it .现在，除非接受补贴的商品也实施配给，否则购买力最强的人会买得最多。

list.abs: 资_百度百科 ... 资质【 natural endowments;intelligence】 资助【 aid financially;subsidize;support】 资力【 financial strength】.
词根联想记忆法词汇教程（八）_在线英语听力室 ... subside v. 平息，平静，退落，减退 subsidize v. 资助，补贴 subsist v. 生存.
消防专业词汇英语翻译(P-Z) ... subroutine 子程序 subsidence 下沉 subsonic reaction 亚音速反应.
水利词汇_文档下载_文档资料库 ... 地下管 Submain 沉陷 Subsidence 收站 Substation， receiving.

entry.def: If a government or other authority subsidizes something, they pay part of the cost of it.

example.ex: Around the world, governments have subsidized the housing of middle and upper-income groups...
example.tran: 全世界各国政府都为中高收入群体提供过住房补贴。

example.ex: At the moment they are existing on pensions that are subsidised by the government.
example.tran: 此刻他们正依靠政府发放的养老金维持生计。

entry.def: If a government subsidizes an industry, they provide money so that the industry can continue.

example.ex: The government continues to subsidize the production of eggs and beef.
example.tran: 政府继续出资扶持鸡蛋和牛肉的生产。

example.ex: ...a government decision to subsidise coal mining.
example.tran: 政府资助煤矿开采的决定

means.word_mean: 1. having partial financial support from public funds;

auth_sentence.content: Thus subsidized-insurance combined with medical advancement means rapidly increasing expenditure.
auth_sentence.res_content: Thus subsidized-insurance combined with medical advancement means rapidly increasing expenditure.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Thus subsidized-insurance combined with medical advancement means rapidly increasing expenditure.

auth_sentence.content: He...quietly subsidized many of the poor farmers by buying extra provisions for them.
auth_sentence.res_content: He...quietly subsidized many of the poor farmers by buying extra provisions for them.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He...quietly subsidized many of the poor farmers by buying extra provisions for them.

auth_sentence.content: Higher education is a relatively inelastic good that is highly subsidized by the government.
auth_sentence.res_content: Higher education is a relatively inelastic good that is highly subsidized by the government.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Higher education is a relatively inelastic good that is highly subsidized by the government.
